data.text:
Jeff Anderson is a Movie Actor with a net worth of $2 million. He was born in April 21, 1970 and is best known for his role as Randal Graves in Clerks, directed by Kevin Smith. He also starred in its sequel, Clerks II, and the film Now You Know.

Jeff Anderson is a member of Movie Actor

Age, Biography and Wiki

ð° Net worth: $2 million (2024)

Jeff Anderson, a famous Movie Actor hailing from Connecticut, has amassed quite a fortune over the years. As of 2024, his net worth is estimated to be around $2 million. With an impressive career in the film industry, Anderson has captured the hearts of many with his exceptional talent and captivating performances. His net worth is a testament to his success and hard work in the industry, solidifying his status as a prominent figure in the world of movies.

About

Actor best known for his role as Randal Graves in Clerks, which was directed by Kevin Smith. He also starred in its sequel, Clerks II, and the film Now You Know.

Before Fame

He attended Henry Hudson Regional High School, where he met.

Trivia

He played Smug in the TV series Star Wars: The Clone Wars.

Family Life

He married his second wife, Barbara Anderson, in 2009.

Associated With

He appeared in Zack and Miri Make a Porno, starring Seth Rogen.
